text: NEO is magazine published in the United Kingdom and Ireland every month. It is published by Uncooked Media. The magazine focuses on different areas of East Asian entertainment, such as Japanese anime and manga, East Asian cinema, cosplay, music, and more. NEO was founded by editor Stu Taylor and designer Claire Trent. The magazine started being sold on 25 November 2004. In March 2020, the magazine was paused due to COVID-19 pandemic and started again from June 2020. == References == Category:Magazines of the United Kingdom Category:Anime
title: Neo (magazine)
